meanings.definition: Toward or in a lower place or position.
meanings.sent1: The cat jumped doun the tree.
meanings.sent2: She placed the book doun on the table.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel ran doun the hill with a nut.
meanings.sent4: The sun slowly sank doun behind the mountains.
meanings.sent5: The ball rolled doun the slope, gaining speed.

meanings.definition: To or toward a lower level or place.
meanings.sent1: Please doun the volume of the music.
meanings.sent2: He carefully douned the ladder to reach the ground.
meanings.sent3: The baker will doun the temperature of the oven.
meanings.sent4: She decided to doun the price of the painting.
meanings.sent5: The teacher asked the students to doun their voices during the exam.

meanings.sent1: The airplane flew doun towards the airport.
meanings.sent2: The hikers walked doun the mountain trail.
meanings.sent3: The leaves fell doun from the tree like confetti.
meanings.sent4: The temperature dropped doun rapidly in the evening.
meanings.sent5: The river flowed doun through the valley, creating a soothing sound.
